name: Poly Car - Prototype
description:
First Racing Game I ever made.

Note

this game is created in 13 days for "Microsoft Virtual Hackathon 2022" and I tried my best to Get a Polished Game. maybe it has some bugs, if you found any bug in the game please email me about that - harindu.dev@outlook.com
